Package camzup.pfriendly

Class ZShader

java.lang.Object
processing.opengl.PShader
camzup.pfriendly.ZShader
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class ZShader
extends processing.opengl.PShader
Extends Processing's PShader to provide support for Cam Z-up core objects: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, Quaternion, Mat3 and Mat4.

    • set

      public void set​(java.lang.String name, Quaternion q)
      Sets a GLSL vec4 uniform to a Quaternion. The real component, 'w' is treated as the last component.
      Parameters:
      name - the uniform name
      q - the quaternion
